text: The Dodge Dakota was an American mid-size pickup truck. It was manufactured by Dodge. The Dakota was always bigger than the compact Ford Ranger and Chevrolet S-10. It was smaller than the Dodge Ram pickup. The truck was first manufactured for 1987. It was last made for 2012. Category:1980s automobiles Category:1990s automobiles Category:2000s automobiles Category:2010s automobiles
title: Dodge Dakota
